short_summary: This procurement is set aside for Indigenous Services Canada to install, repair, and move furniture and equipment within British Columbia.
description: Installation, repair, and moving services are required for owned and leased furniture and equipment within the British Columbia region.
tags: Custom Linked Services, Installation, storage and logistics, office equipment, Industrial/Furniture electronic storage, storage and distribution of goods, external mediums, and components, custom logistics, retro-fitting of goods and equipement, Storage and transportation of heavy goods and equipment
full_summary:
### Installation, Repair, and Moving Services :: Services d'installation, de réparation et de déménagement
#### Solicitation Information
* Title: Installation, Repair and Moving Services / Services d’installation, de réparation et de déménagement
* Reference Number: PW-23-01031319
* Amendment Number: 4
* Solicitation Number: 1000244533
* Publication Date: April 3, 2023
* Tender Closing Date & Time: May 24, 2023 (2:00 PM ET)

#### Bid Description
This Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) is issued under the federal government's Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business. Indigenous Services Canada (ISC), British Columbia (BC) Region is seeking installation, repair, and moving services for owned and leased furniture and equipment within BC Region on an as-required basis.

The worksite is located at:
1138 Melville Street, Vancouver, BC V6E 4S3

Removal of surplus, e-waste, and recycling, and delivery to the designated facilities within the Greater Vancouver Area is also required.

#### Procurement Details
* Procurement Category: Goods and Services / Approvisionnement de biens et de services.
* Method of Procurement: Competitive Selective Tendering / Appel d'offres concurrentiel avec sélection.
* ProcurementType: Request for Standing Offer / Demande d'offre à commandes.

#### Contract Information
The Soliciting Party intends to enter into one (1) Standing Offer Agreement (SOA) for a period of three (3) years with an additional two (2) one-year option periods under the same terms and conditions.

#### Contract Security
There are no security requirements associated with this RFSO.

#### Contract Contact Information
For further details, please contact:
Madore, Christine
Email: [christine.madore@sac-isc.gc.ca](mailto:christine.madore@sac-isc.gc.ca)
Phone: 873-354-1376
Address:
10 Wellington St., Gatineau, QC, K1A 0H4, Canada

#### Attachments
The following documents are available:
• RFSO Amendment 2 - DOC Modification No. 2
• RFSP Amendment 1 - DOC Modification No. 1
• RFSP - ISC RFSO QS & RS 1 to 8
• RFSO 1 - DOC SAC QS & RS 1
